sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2007/L.22), the SBI acknowledges the commendable efforts by parties and experts, supported by the Secretariat, to conduct 36 reviews of the initial reports.
It notes, however, that the review process needs further strengthening.
The SBI also notes the importance of a training programme under the Protocol and the need for consistent implementation of technical guidance on adjustments.
It also notes with concern the high volume of work in 2008.
enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
